skmultiflow.options.base_option module¶

class skmultiflow.options.base_option.BaseOption[source]¶

Bases: skmultiflow.core.base_object.BaseObject

The abstract class that defines the constraints for all option classes in this framework.

Raises:NotImplementedError: This is an abstract class.
get_class_type()[source]¶
get_cli_char()[source]¶

Return type:char or string

Notes

Deprecated. Do not use this function.
